feed.title: AO3 - Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,651Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 80

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

entry.title: Childish crushes
entry.summary:
Author: Cringe_Fella

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,017Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 774

Summary: Instead of lunging at him, the monster stumbled, as it tried to stand, and Clark saw as a child's leg slipped out of a big black boot before tangling in a yellow belt, small, very childish hands trying and failing to catch it. And maybe… And maybe it wasn't a monster at all, because as Clark watched, transfixed, the kid - because it had to be a kid, he didn't seem to be older than Clark- face planted on the floor without making even a single noise._______Or: a magical mishap accidently turns the World's Finest into an 8 and a 9 year old. Shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,419Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 93

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: Why Can't Anything Be Simple?
entry.summary:
Author: Megamagic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,650Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 43

Summary: Green Lantern and Batman are sent to another planet to try to stop a war that would consume a vast part of the galaxy.However in the middle of the mission the planet is attacked by a power hungry species who thrive on war. To protect the lives of everyone on the planet Batman surrenders himself to the leader of the species. Who is fascinated by making the man his pet. The Justice League rush to rescue their teammate but is met with many road blocks along the way. (Be aware this is a WIP and the tags are not updated fully. This is going to be a dark one so please re-check tags with every new chapter I post.)

entry.title: How Far Do Baby Bats Fly?
entry.summary:
Author: Krisrift

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,366Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1,249

Summary: Bruce is de-aged into that of a child and his kids are there to clean up after him in the most literal of sense. With every layer they peel back of their father figure, their mentor, the more questions they need answered; most pressingly, did this kid not get therapy?or,They knew Bruce Wayne didn't have the most well-adjusted upbringing and had some odd quirks due it, but meeting him as he is now, Bruce might have truly outdone himself here.

entry.title: The Eye of The Storm - Batfam x OC
entry.summary:
Author: Kkora08

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,347Chapters: 24/24Kudos: 3

Summary: Aroha originally from Aotearoa, New Zealand gets her life uprooted and moved to Gotham when her dad gets a job at Wayne Enterprise. Her first time out of her home country in a small part of the world to the dark streets of Gotham and a city that seems bigger than she could even imagine. Will her secrets stay hidden in this infamously crime ridden city or will the horrors of Gotham claim another victim... ~~~~~Aroha and her father are my own creation and everyone else belongs to their respective creators. All characters will be aged up and no weird minor stuff will happen!

entry.summary:
Author: ArtisticallyMiserable

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,941Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 185

entry.title: Cursed Child
entry.summary:
Author: J4YYYZ

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,568Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 308

Summary: Bruce gets de-aged into a 16-year old after being hit by an alien weapon from an attempted invasion. The 16 year old who trained under the LOA.The 16 year old who ran away from Alfred.The 16 year old who was manipulated into something else.The 16 year old who was made a weapon.The 16 year old who never had a childhood. Bruce tries to forget the days of when he trained under Ra's, but small habits and reflexes he thought were long gone start to resurface, along with memories being freshly remembered as if it was yesterday. It haunts him slowly, eating him out from the inside before taking action after playing with its food.

entry.title: These Are the Days Returned
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,708Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 180

Summary: Bruce wakes up in a Gotham that isn’t his own—younger, unscarred, in a world where Batman never existed. He is surrounded by children who still found their way into vigilantism without his intervention, who look at him with affection and wariness in equal measure.They believe he’s their Bruce, recovering from a brutal attack, but he knows he isn’t. But as he plays along, trying to piece together the secrets of this world and the reason for his presence here, staying silent may prove just as dangerous—because whoever wanted this world’s Bruce Wayne dead isn’t finished yet.

entry.title: you're just a sad song with nothing to say
entry.summary:
Author: cinderellion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,267Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 179

Summary: "Bruce, are these scars from...electricity?" Clark's voice was shaky. His eyes were full of fear as his fingers traced down the scars along his chest.Bruce sighed heavily. Sounding tired more so than normal, "Yeah, from my time in Arkham."Or,Bruce has always had scars, and sometimes people could help but didn't know how to, or couldn't completely, or simply there was nobody there.Now there seemed to be someone who knew exactly how to help. How to heal both those physical and mental scars.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,555Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 654

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.

entry.title: Hidden Royals
entry.summary:
Author: Rinning_Away

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 575Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: It was too quick too fast an unknown group attacked her kingdom. Not an attack on the crown... no. An attack on every living thing on the kingdom's ground. It was supposed to be a day of joy and remembrance. Now it represents the death of thousands. Her birthday will never be the same. She travels far to safety. At least safer than her home. With only one servant. The only one that lived. They were both teens. Scared and alone. But fear mustn't consume her. She will revive what was once hers.

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,074Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 624

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.

entry.title: In Alternate Relation
entry.summary:
Author: Effi_Bee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,918Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 313

Summary: As he lay on his back in the snow, his soon to be murderer already long gone, he couldn’t help but find this situation ironically funny. How it started this way; a bullet lodging itself into a chest. The start and-however pathetic-end of Spider-Man. He had gone full circle now. Hilarious. or Peter Benjamin Parker dies in his world alone and forgotten, only to appear in a different dimension on a different earth in an unknown city with mysterious heroes. Vigilantes? Or are they just urban legends? He decides to start a new chapter in his-new-life, because isn't that what you do when you are supposed to be dead? You move on. (It doesn't matter that it's not really working. It's the effort that counts.)
